#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;
int main(){

    int t,w,n,i,k,g,q;

    scanf("%d",&t);

    while(t--){

        cin>>n;
        int a[n];
        for(i=0;i<n;++i) scanf("%d",&a[i]);

        int min=a[0],pos=0;

        sort(a,a+n);

        for(i=0;i<n/2;++i){
            cout<<a[i]<<" "<<a[n-i-1]<<" ";
        }
        if(n%2==1) cout<<a[(n+1)/2-1];
        cout<<"\n";
    }

    return 0;
}
